name: Celsius
intro: The mainstream temperature unit worldwide, the core measurement standard for daily life, industry, and meteorological observation.

name: Fahrenheit
intro: The mainstream unit in a few countries such as the United States and the Bahamas, adapted for daily temperature and industrial temperature control scenarios.

name: Kelvin
intro: The SI unit of temperature, applicable to professional scenarios such as physical experiments, aerospace, and low-temperature engineering.

name: Rankine
intro: A special unit for engineering in the UK and US, adapted for industrial scenarios such as thermal engineering and refrigeration technology.
